info.+content: Sakata Gintoki is a broke samurai living in an era when samurai are no longer needed. To add to his troubles, oppressive aliens called Amanto have moved into town. Gintoki lives with Kagura and Shinpachi, taking on odd jobs to make the world a better place... and to pay their rent.
2006-12-05 to 2007-04-03 (North America, Shonen Jump USA serializaton)
